about_the_game:
The original soundtrack of Little Busters! Ecstasy is now available on Steam!
With the ten newly added background music tracks and two theme songs from Little Busters! Ecstasy, this album is perfect for fans who have successfully discovered the secret of the world!
Download Little Busters! Ecstasy Tracks now to relive your Little Busters! moments both at home and on to go!

* This soundtrack DLC is a digital version of the original 2008 soundtrack album Little Busters! Ecstasy Tracks (KLSA-0043) and features 15 tracks.

Little Busters! Ecstasy Tracks Track list

1. Little Busters! -Ecstasy Short Ver.-

2. Will & Wish
3. The Cat, the Glass, and the Round Moon
4. Run
5. glassware
6. Saya's Melody
7. Labyrinth
8. Shadow Buster
9. Thinking Time
10. Sha La La Ecstasy
11. Saya's Song -Short Ver.-
12. Song for friends -No Intro Ver.-
13. Alicemagic -Rockstar Short Ver.-
14. Saya's Song
15. Little Busters! -Ecstacy Ver.-

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: FLAC or MP3-compatible music player or Steam music player
